summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1299, for the improvement of 26th Avenue South, form Yesler Way to Day Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and re-grading the same, by constructing wooden curbs, gutters, etc, under Ordinance No. 14173 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
